text: I'usupha balalena, â€˜tomaderake ye khadya deya haya ta asara age ami tomaderake sbapnera tatparya janiye deba [1]. Ami ya tomaderake balaba ta, amara raba amake ya siksa diyechena ta theke balaba. Niscaya ami barjana karechi se sampradayera dharmamata yara allahra upara imana ane na. Ara yara akhiratera sathe kupharikari.â€™
